column1: Table 1: Adults' body mass index (BMI), overweight and obesity prevalence, by age and sex
Health Survey for England 2019. Adults aged 16 and over with valid height and weight measurements
Source: Health Survey for England 2019, NHS Digital
1. The data in these tables have been weighted. Both unweighted and weighted sample sizes are shown at the foot of the table.
